tasks.description: Polish the Inbox Review screen per canonical workflow. Row display: title, [Board Q] badge, excerpt, correctness indicator (✓/✗), relative time. Detail panel on click with [Add to Notebook] button. Batch actions: Archive (status='curated'), Delete (with confirm). See docs/Workflow_Guide.ini Step 2.
tasks.details:
WORKFLOW 4: BROWSE INBOX COMPLETION

SCREEN MOCKUP:
```
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  INBOX (23 items)                                                          |
|                                                                             |
|  [Search...]                    [Sort: Newest v]  [Filter: All Types v]    |
|                                                                             |
|  -------------------------------------------------------------------------  |
|                                                                             |
|  [ ] CKD G3 - CV Mortality                [Nephro] QBank check   2 hrs ago |
|  [ ] Afib Rate Control vs Rhythm          [Cardio] QBank x       3 hrs ago |
|  [ ] COPD Exacerbation Management         [Pulm]   QBank check   Yesterday |
|  [ ] Diabetic Ketoacidosis Workup         [Endo]   QBank x       Yesterday |
|  [ ] UpToDate: Heart Failure Guidelines   [Cardio] Article       2 days    |
|  ...                                                                        |
|                                                                             |
|  -------------------------------------------------------------------------  |
|                                                                             |
|  With selected: [Add to Notebook] [Archive] [Delete]                       |
|                                                                             |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
```

CURRENT STATE:
- List view works
- Search works
- Delete works

MISSING/BROKEN:
1. Archive uses DELETE instead of status='curated'
2. Filter by sourceType not implemented
3. Sort options not implemented
4. Batch selection not implemented

FLOW:
1. User opens Inbox from sidebar
2. Load items: sourceItemQueries.getByStatus('inbox')
3. User can:
   - Click item -> View source detail modal
   - Select + [Add to Notebook] -> Workflow 2
   - Select + [Archive] -> status = 'curated' (NOT delete)
   - Select + [Delete] -> DELETE with confirmation
4. Filters: by sourceType, domain (from metadata.subject)
5. Sort: by createdAt (newest/oldest)

DATABASE OPERATIONS:
```typescript
// List inbox
const items = await window.api.getSourceItemsByStatus('inbox');

// Archive (mark as curated) - FIX THIS
await window.api.updateSourceItemStatus(id, 'curated');

// Delete
await window.api.deleteSourceItem(id);
```

FILTERS TO ADD:
- sourceType: qbank, article, pdf, image, quickcapture, manual, all
- domain: from metadata.subject field, dynamically populated

SORT OPTIONS:
- Newest first (default)
- Oldest first
- By domain (alphabetical)
- By type

BATCH OPERATIONS:
- Checkbox selection on each row
- "Select All" checkbox in header
- Batch actions: Add to Notebook (opens for first selected), Archive, Delete
- Archive batch: no confirmation needed
- Delete batch: "Delete X items? This cannot be undone."

EDGE CASES:

Empty inbox:
- Show: "Inbox empty! Capture some content to get started." [Capture]

Batch actions on many items:
- Archive: Update all, no confirmation needed
- Delete: Confirm "Delete X items? This cannot be undone."
tasks.testStrategy: Test Archive changes status to 'curated' not delete. Test archived items no longer appear in inbox. Test filter by sourceType works. Test sort by newest/oldest works. Test batch selection with Select All. Test batch archive updates all without confirmation. Test batch delete shows confirmation. Test empty inbox shows capture prompt.

tasks.title: Step 4: Notebook Topic Page - Polish
tasks.description: Polish the Notebook Topic Page per canonical workflow. Block cards show: title, source badge + correctness (✓/✗) + relative time, content (user insight), confusion note if present. Footer: card count + [Edit] [+ Card] [View Source]. See docs/Workflow_Guide.ini Step 4.
tasks.details:
WORKFLOW 5: BROWSE NOTEBOOK COMPLETION

SCREEN MOCKUP:
```
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  NOTEBOOK                                                [Search...]       |
|                                                                             |
|  +--------------+ +----------------------------------------------------+   |
|  | DOMAINS      | |  Chronic Kidney Disease                   12 blocks|   |
|  |              | |                                                    |   |
|  | v Nephrology | |  +----------------------------------------------+ |   |
|  |   - CKD (12) | |  | CKD - CV Mortality Risk            2hrs ago  | |   |
|  |   - AKI (5)  | |  | [Cardio] [Mgmt] [Cross-Topic]                | |   |
|  |   - GN (3)   | |  | "CKD patients 4-5x more likely to die..."    | |   |
|  |              | |  | Links: 3  Source: 1  Cards: 0                | |   |
|  | > Cardiology | |  +----------------------------------------------+ |   |
|  | > Pulmonology| |                                                    |   |
|  | > GI         | |  +----------------------------------------------+ |   |
|  | > Endocrine  | |  | CKD Staging and GFR                2 days ago| |   |
|  | ...          | |  | [Dx] [Boards-HY]                             | |   |
|  |              | |  | "Stage G3a: 45-59, G3b: 30-44..."            | |   |
|  | ------------ | |  | Links: 2  Source: 2  Cards: 1                | |   |
|  | FILTERS:     | |  +----------------------------------------------+ |   |
|  | [ ] Cross-Top| |                                                    |   |
|  | [ ] Boards-HY| |  [+ Add Block]                                    |   |
|  | [ ] No Cards | |                                                    |   |
|  +--------------+ +----------------------------------------------------+   |
|                                                                             |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
```

CURRENT STATE:
- Domain tree sidebar works
- Topic selection works
- Block list works

MISSING:
1. Cross-block search (search all blocks by content)
2. Filters in sidebar: Cross-Topic, Boards-HY, No Cards
3. Block counts in domain tree

FLOW:
1. User opens Notebook from sidebar
2. Left sidebar: domains with nested topics
   - Expand domain -> show topics with block counts
3. Click topic -> load blocks for that topic's page
4. Click block card -> Workflow 6 (Block Detail)
5. Filters affect block list
6. Search searches across ALL blocks (content field)

DATABASE QUERIES:
```typescript
// Get domain tree with counts
const topics = await window.api.getAllCanonicalTopics();
// Group by domain, count blocks per topic

// Get blocks for topic
const page = await window.api.getNotebookTopicPageByTopic(topicId);
const blocks = await window.api.getNotebookBlocksByPage(page.id);

// For each block, fetch source info
for (const block of blocks) {
  block.source = await window.api.getSourceItem(block.sourceItemId);
}

// NEW: Search all blocks by content
const searchResults = await window.api.searchNotebookBlocks(query);
// Returns blocks with topic name, content excerpt, match highlights
```

FILTERS (sidebar checkboxes):

[ ] Cross-Topic:
- Show only blocks where source has multiple canonicalTopicIds
- OR blocks tagged with 'Cross-Topic'

[ ] Boards-HY:
- Show only blocks tagged with 'Boards-HY' or 'High-Yield'

[ ] No Cards:
- Show only blocks where cardCount = 0
- Helps identify content not yet converted to cards

SEARCH:
- Search box in header searches ALL notebook blocks
- Searches block.content field
- Returns results grouped by topic
- Click result -> navigate to that topic and highlight block

IPC TO ADD:
```typescript
// Search notebook blocks by content
window.api.searchNotebookBlocks(query: string): Promise<Array<{
  block: DbNotebookBlock;
  topicName: string;
  excerpt: string;  // Content snippet with match
}>>
```

UI UPDATES:
- Add search input in notebook header
- Add filter checkboxes in sidebar below domain tree
- Add block count badges next to each topic in tree
- Search results appear in main area, replacing topic view temporarily
tasks.testStrategy: Test cross-block search finds blocks by content. Test search results show topic name and excerpt. Test clicking search result navigates to topic. Test Cross-Topic filter shows multi-topic blocks. Test Boards-HY filter shows tagged blocks. Test No Cards filter shows blocks with cardCount=0. Test block counts appear in domain tree. Test filters can be combined.

Workflow 3: AI Backlink Detection (Async)
Step 3: Add to Notebook - AI-Assisted Insight Extraction
tasks.description: Enhance the Add to Notebook modal with AI-assisted insight extraction. AI identifies what the source tested (auto on modal open), user writes takeaway in their own words (active recall), optional AI polish to clean up/enhance their writing. User stays in control throughout.
tasks.details:
STEP 3: ADD TO NOTEBOOK - AI-ASSISTED INSIGHT EXTRACTION

PRINCIPLE: User in control, AI assists
- User types/picks topic -> AI normalizes silently via autocomplete
- User writes insight -> AI evaluates on request (existing Get Feedback)
- User can polish -> AI suggests cleaned version (new)

UI FLOW:
```
Modal Opens
    |
    v
AI identifies tested concept (loading state)
    |
    v
User sees 'This question tested: X'
User writes in textarea
    |
    |--- User clicks [Save] ---------> Saves original text
    |
    |--- User clicks [Polish] -------> AI generates polished version
                                       Show comparison panel
                                       [Keep Original] [Use Polished]
                                           |
                                           v
                                       Selected version in textarea
                                       User clicks [Save to Notebook]
```

UI MOCKUP:
```
+-------------------------------------------------------------+
|  ADD TO NOTEBOOK                                       [x]  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------+
|  Source Preview                                    [Expand] |
+-------------------------------------------------------------+
|  Topic                                                      |
|  [autocomplete input - already implemented]                 |
+-------------------------------------------------------------+
|  CONCEPT TESTED                          (auto-generated)   |
|  'First-line treatment for status epilepticus'              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------+
|  YOUR TAKEAWAY                                              |
|  What did you learn? Write in your own words.               |
|  +--------------------------------------------------------+ |
|  | benzos first like lorazepam. dont wait...              | |
|  +--------------------------------------------------------+ |
|                                   Min 20 chars    [Polish]  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------+
|  (Polish Panel - appears after clicking Polish)             |
|  Your version: 'benzos first like lorazepam...'             |
|  Polished: 'Benzodiazepines (lorazepam, midazolam) are...'  |
|  Added context: lorazepam/midazolam examples, >5min         |
|  [Keep Original]  [Use Polished]                            |
+-------------------------------------------------------------+
|                     [Get Feedback]  [Save to Notebook]      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------+
```

NEW AI FUNCTIONS (ai-service.ts):
1. identifyTestedConcept(sourceContent, sourceType)
   - Returns: { concept: string, confidence: 'high'|'medium'|'low' }
   - Prompt varies by sourceType (QBank vs textbook vs lecture)

2. polishInsight(userText, sourceContent, testedConcept)
   - Returns: { polished: string, fromUser: string[], addedContext: string[] }
   - Cleans up language, expands abbreviations
   - CAN add relevant details from source (Option 2)
   - Tracks what was added for transparency

NEW IPC HANDLERS:
- ai:identifyTestedConcept
- ai:polishInsight

NEW TYPES:
- TestedConceptResult { concept, confidence }
- PolishInsightParams { userText, sourceContent, testedConcept? }
- PolishedInsightResult { polished, fromUser[], addedContext[] }

COMPONENT CHANGES:
1. AddToNotebookWorkflow.tsx:
   - Add state: testedConcept, isLoadingConcept, showPolishPanel, polishedVersion, isPolishing
   - On modal open: call identifyTestedConcept()
   - Add ConceptTestedBadge section
   - Add PolishPanel component
   - Handlers: handlePolish, handleKeepOriginal, handleUsePolished

2. InsightTextarea.tsx:
   - Add optional [Polish] button when valid
   - Pass onPolishClick callback

EXISTING COMPONENTS (keep as-is):
- TopicSelector (just refactored to autocomplete)
- BoardRelevancePanel
- SourcePreviewPanel
- Get Feedback button (existing AI evaluation)

EDGE CASES:
- AI can't identify concept (low confidence): Show generic 'What's the key takeaway?'
- Polish fails: Toast error, keep original text
- Non-QBank sources: Different prompts for textbook/lecture/article
tasks.testStrategy: Test concept identification runs on modal open. Test loading state shows while identifying. Test concept displays correctly for QBank sources. Test Polish button appears when insight is valid. Test Polish loading state. Test polished version comparison panel shows both versions. Test 'Added context' shows what AI added. Test Keep Original closes panel and keeps original. Test Use Polished replaces textarea content. Test Save saves whatever is in textarea. Test works with existing Get Feedback flow. Test error handling for AI failures.

subtasks.title: AI Service: identifyTestedConcept function
subtasks.details: Add identifyTestedConcept(sourceContent, sourceType) to ai-service.ts. Returns { concept, confidence }. Different prompts for QBank vs textbook vs lecture.

subtasks.title: AI Service: polishInsight function
subtasks.details:
Add polishInsight(userText, sourceContent, testedConcept) to ai-service.ts. Returns { polished, fromUser[], addedContext[] }. Cleans language, can add relevant details, tracks additions.
<info added on 2026-01-25T15:37:40.129Z>
Implemented in electron/ai-service.ts as polishInsightWithFallback() which delegates to electron/ai/tasks/polish-insight.ts. Function accepts (userText, sourceContent, testedConcept) and returns { polished, fromUser, addedContext }. Includes response caching for identical inputs and graceful error handling that returns original user text if AI processing fails.
</info added on 2026-01-25T15:37:40.129Z>

subtasks.title: IPC Handlers for new AI functions
subtasks.details: Add ai:identifyTestedConcept and ai:polishInsight IPC handlers. Add types to electron.d.ts and preload.ts.

subtasks.title: AddToNotebookWorkflow: Concept identification on open

subtasks.title: InsightTextarea: Add Polish button

subtasks.title: AddToNotebookWorkflow: Polish panel UI and handlers
subtasks.details: Add PolishPanel UI showing original vs polished, added context list, Keep Original and Use Polished buttons. Includes handlers: handlePolish() calls AI and shows panel, handleKeepOriginal() closes panel, handleUsePolished() replaces textarea content and closes panel. Panel appears below InsightTextarea when Polish is clicked.
